sys_script.name: Prevent Duplicate Triggers

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_9fc7b3fb479a4e508bb7bf99516d4355
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>true</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>sn_jira_spoke_jira_integration_trigger</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="sn_jira_spoke_jira_integration_trigger">u_tableVALCHANGES^ORu_operationVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="u_table" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item display_value="-- None --" endquery="false" field="u_operation" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="true" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Prevent Duplicate Triggers</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var table = current.getValue("u_table");
	var operation = current.getValue("u_operation");

	var triggerRecord = new JiraCustomUtils().getTrigger(table, operation);

	if (gs.nil(triggerRecord)) {
		// Record can safely be created
		return;
	}

	current.setValue("u_table", previous.getValue("u_table"));
	current.setValue("u_operation", previous.getValue("u_operation"));

	gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage("Trigger already exists for table/operation provied") + "!");
	current.setAbortAction(true);

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lucas.guerino@crossfuze.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-05-28 10:34:36</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>9fc7b3fb479a4e508bb7bf99516d4355</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Prevent Duplicate Triggers</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Jira Spoke" source="sn_jira_spoke">4fab4673db1893009a985404ce961942</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Jira Spoke">4fab4673db1893009a985404ce961942</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_9fc7b3fb479a4e508bb7bf99516d4355</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lucas.guerino@crossfuze.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-05-28 10:58:24</sys_updated_on><template/><when>before</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=9fc7b3fb479a4e508bb7bf99516d4355"/></record_update>
